00008     Socket::Socket(int port)
00009     {
00010         Error = false;
00011 
00012         if (port > 0)
00013         {
00014             serverPort = port;
00015         }
00016         else
00017         {
00018             Error = true;
00019             serverPort = 80;
00020         }
00021 
00022         socketDescriptor = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00023         if (socketDescriptor < 0)
00024         {
00025             Error = true;
00026         }
00027     }

00050     bool Socket::connectSocket()
00051     {
00052         //std::cout << "In connectSocket(SocketAddress* address)" <<std::endl;
00053         //hostInfo = address->getAddressStruct();
00054         //std::cout << "Got hostInfo from address->getAddressStruct()" <<std::endl;
00055 
00056         serverAddress.sin_family = hostInfo->h_addrtype;
00057         //std::cout << "Assigned serverAddress hostinfo" <<std::endl;
00058         memcpy((char *) &serverAddress.sin_addr.s_addr,
00059                hostInfo->h_addr_list[0], hostInfo->h_length);
00060         //std::cout << "memcpy opertaion to serverAddress and hostinfo" <<std::endl;
00061         serverAddress.sin_port = htons(serverPort);
00062         //std::cout << "Assigned serverAddress the serverPort as " << serverAddress.sin_port <<std::endl;
00063 
00064         if (connect(socketDescriptor,
00065                     (sockaddr *) &serverAddress,
00066                     sizeof(serverAddress)) < 0)
00067         {
00068             //std::cerr << "Unable to connect to address from Socket! Returning!" <<std::endl;
00069             Error = true;
00070             return false;
00071         }
00072         //std::cout << "Returning from connectSocket(SocketAddress* address)\n" <<std::endl;
00073         return true;
00074     }

00096     bool Socket::sendData(Packet* data)
00097     {
00098         //std::cout << "In Socket::sendData(Packet* data)" <<std::endl;
00099         //std::cout << "Create charBuffer with getMaxDataSize()" <<std::endl;
00100         char charBuffer[getMaxDataSize()];
00101         //std::cout << "Copy data to charBuffer" <<std::endl;
00102         strcpy(charBuffer,data->getData().c_str());
00103         //std::cout << "Send data" <<std::endl;
00104         if (send(socketDescriptor, charBuffer, strlen(charBuffer) + 1, 0) < 0)
00105         {
00106             Error = true;
00107             //std::cerr << "Error in sending data to server. Closing socket and exiting function!" <<std::endl;
00108             close(socketDescriptor);
00109             //std::cerr << "Socket closed. Aborting sendData function!\n" <<std::endl;
00110             return false;
00111         }
00112         //std::cout << "Returning from Socket::sendData(Packet* data)\n" <<std::endl;
00113         return true;
00114     }

00116     bool Socket::sendData(std::string data)
00117     {
00118         Packet *p = new Packet(data);
00119         sendData(p);
00120         return false;
00121     }

00123     std::string Socket::readDataAsString()
00124     {
00125         char charBuffer[getMaxDataSize()];
00126         memset(charBuffer, 0x0, getMaxDataSize()+1);
00127         if (recv(socketDescriptor, charBuffer, getMaxDataSize(), 0) < 0)
00128         {
00129             Error = true;
00130             close(socketDescriptor);
00131         }
00132         std::string tmpStr = charBuffer;
00133         return tmpStr;
00134     }
00135 
00136     Packet* Socket::readData()
00137     {
00138         std::string tmpStr = readDataAsString();
00139         Packet* pack = new Packet(tmpStr);
00140         return pack;
00141     }
